section.title: VirtuosoException Class
section.para: The exception that is thrown when Virtuoso server returns a warning or error. This class cannot be inherited.

section.title: Thread Safety
section.para: Any public static (Shared in Visual Basic) members of this type are safe for multithreaded operations. Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

section.title: Remarks
section.para: This class is created whenever the Virtuoso .NET Data Provider encounters an error generated by the server (Client-side errors are raised as standard common language runtime exceptions.). It always contains at least one instance of VirtuosoError.

section.title: Errors Property
section.para: Gets a collection of one or more VirtuosoError objects that give detailed information about exceptions generated by the Virtuoso .NET Data Provider.

section.title: Property Value
section.para: The collected instances of the VirtuosoError class.

section.title: Remarks
section.para: This property is a wrapper for the VirtuosoErrorCollection.

section.title: Message Property
section.para: Gets the text describing the error.

section.title: Remarks
section.para: This is a wrapper for the Message property of the first VirtuosoError in the Errors property.
